La señora Claudia Banessa G. tiene 29 años de edad, esta casada con el sr. Romel Felipe Ferrufino y tiene 4 hijos. Su esposo le apoya con los gastos familiares, viven en el barrio San Antonio de la ciudad de San Lorenzo desde hace 4 años.
Claudia se dedica al negocio de produccion y venta de tortillas, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion, su produccion es de lunes a domingo.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de leña, maiz cal y agua, las ventas han aumentado y ahora no se da abasto para cubrir con todas las necesidades de sus clientes.
su meta es darles un buen estudio y una mejor calidad de vida a sus 4 hijos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Claudia Banessa G. is 29 years old and she is married to Mr. Romel Felipe Ferrufino. They have 4 children together. Her husband helps with the family's expenses and they have lived in the district of San Antonio in the city of San Lorenzo for the past 4 years.

Claudia has a business making and selling tortillas. Her business is located in her home and she produces from Monday to Sunday. 

The loan will be used to purchase firewood, corn, lime, and water. Her sales have been increasing and today she is unable to meet all of her clients' demands.

Her goal is to provide her 4 children with a good education and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn, lime, firewood, and water.

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is a 46-year-old married woman and the mother of three children. She is the owner of a clothing shop where she sells women's and children's clothes. She is well known in her region. Most of her clients are relatives, friends and neighbors. She's a hard worker and seeks perfection for her family. 

Khadija is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua for the third time, in order to increase her spring/summer collection, which will help in saving the necessary money for a special surgery that she needs to have after increasing her income. 

Her previous loans were used to improve her business and they had a big positive effect in improving her income. She hopes to buy her own shop and move to it, so she can stop renting others' shops.

loans.use: to increase her spring/summer clothing collection.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre de familia de 60 años de edad, vive con su esposo,  hija y nieto en su casa propia la cual cuenta con los servicios básicos de agua y luz, en donde acondicionado en su sala un lugar para colocar su su pequeña tienda, ubicado en la zona rural de la campiña  El Pariso a unos 15 minutos del distrito Andrés Razuri a 30 minutos de la provincia de Ascope y a una hora de distancia al departamento de La Libertad (Trujillo) .  Estas zonas se caracterizan por su alta actividad comercial, agricola, ganadera y turística  que desarrollan sus pobladores.

Rosa se dedica a su casa su tienda, en cual sus  vecinos encuentran algunos de productos  ( papel higiénico, lejía, detergente y golosinas, etc.), con su pequeño negocio que a colocado Rosa trata en lo posible de brindar un mejor nivel de vida para su familia, también le ayuda su hija con los ingresos económicos, ya que trabaja como empleada doméstica e una casa de familia.

Mediante una visita a Edpyme Alternativa Rosa trata de adquirir un préstamo de 600 nuevos soles para abastecer su tienda de más insumos y así pueda satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, y de paso incrementar  sus ingresos.

Rosa es conocida por sus vecinos, por ser una mujer  alegre, dispuesta a ayudar a otros y una madre responsable con el objetivo de que como familia salgan adelante apunta de esfuerzo y trabajo.
texts.en:
Rosa is the mother of a family. She is 60 years old and she lives with her husband, her daughter, and a grandson in a house of their own. it is equipped with running water and with hydro. The living room was reconditioned to host a small store. It is located in the rural village of El Pariso, at 15 minutes from the district of Andres Razuri, at 30 minutes from the province of Ascope, and at 1 hour's distance form the department of La Libertad (Trujillo). These regions are known for the important business activities of population, including commerce, agriculture, farming, and tourism. 

Rosa manages the store in her house where her neighbors find some products (bathroom tissue, bleach, detergent, sweets, etc.). The small business that Rosa has installed she tries her best to provide her family with a better quality of life. Her daughter also contributes to their income. She provides cleaning services in a private family home.

At a visit to Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) Rosa requested a loan of 600 nuevos soles to supply her store with more inventory in order to meet the needs of her clients, and in turn to increase her earnings.

Rosa is known by her neighbors to be a very happy woman who is ready to help others. She is a responsible mother whose objective for her family is to provide for them through her efforts and hard work.

loans.use: to purchase more products to supply her business.

loans.name: Celso

texts.es:
El señor Celso A. tiene 63 años de edad, esta casado y vive con su esposa y dos de sus hijos.
Celso se dedica a la venta de abarroteria en su pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion ubicada en la aldea La Caucara de San Lorenzo. 
don Celso es muy trabajador y responsable, por las noches trabaja en una empacadora de camarones en el area de limpieza.
cuando el sale a trabajar por las noches su esposa es quien se dedica a la pulperia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio.
Su sueño es que todos sus hijos esten bien y que busquen de Dios.
texts.en:
Mr. Celso A. is 63 years old. He is married and he lives with his wife and their two children. Celso sells groceries from a store installed in his house. It is located in the village of La Caucara in San Lorenzo.

Celso is very hard working and responsible. During the night he works as a janitor at a shrimp packaging plant. When he goes out to work at night his wife is who manages the store. 

The loan will be used to purchase groceries to supply his business.

His dream is that all of his children be well and that they look to God.

loans.use: to purchase products to supply his store.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es: Lisbeth tiene 27 años, vive con su madre y su hijo en casa de su madre. Hace 1 año y medio que se dedica en la venta de objetos artesanales que ella misma elabora. Su madre la ayuda a realizar esta actividad, que después de un intenso trabajo de toda la semana viaja  a la ciudad de Lima para venderlos en el mercado artesanal de dicha ciudad. Los  artículos de artesanía que produce tienen mucha demanda, por eso tiene ventas  exitosas con frecuencia y más pedidos que la obligan a aumentar su producción. Considera que su trabajo es rentable porque recupera lo invertido, además que lo hace en la comodidad de su casa y sobre todo que este trabajo la hace independiente. En adelante lo que más desea es incrementar su producción. Es segundo crédito con MFP, es relativamente nueva en su grupo del banco comunal que integra y se siente muy contenta por ella le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para elaborar más artículos  artesanales.
texts.en: Lisbeth is 27 years old. She lives with her mother and her son in her mother's house. For the past year and a half she has been selling crafts that she makes herself. Her mother helps her with the business and after a week's worth of intense work she travels to the city of Lima to sell them in the city's crafts market. The crafts that she makes are in great demand and she enjoys frequent sales and more orders placed force her to increase production. She considers her work to be profitable because she recovers her investments and she also works in the comfort of her home, and above all, she works independently. In the future what she wants most is to increase production. This is her second loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She is relatively new in her communal bank but she is very happy because she enjoys being a part of it. All of the members are individuals whom she knows. They are responsible and supportive. She is thankful to those individuals who will contribute to the loan which she requests. it will be very helpful in the progress of her business. The loan that she requests will be invested in the purchase of products she needs to create her crafts.

loans.use: to purchase materials for crafting.

loans.name: Elia Aurora

texts.es:
Elia D. 69 años D. edad,es casada, tiene casa propia y vive en la zona rural del distrito D. San Pedro D. Lloc a unos 30 minutos D. la provincia D. Pacasmayo y a una hora del departamento D. la Libertad (Trujillo).  Acá sus pobladores se dedican al comercio, agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Elia tiene un puesto en el mercado D. San Pedro D. Lloc desD. hace unos 20 años, donD. venD. toda clase D. verduras, actividad que le permite tener ingresos diarios y cuenta con su propia clientela.  Al ver que su negocio día a día va creciendo ha creido necesario solitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad D. productos (verdudras) y seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad D. sus clientes que han ido en incremento en su negocio, lo que le permitirá poder pagar su préstamo y solventar sus gastos en su casa.

Elia es conocida por ser una mujer D. trabajo que con mucho esfuerzo a sacado su negocio adelante, para mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Elia, 69, is married. She has her own house and lives in the rural area of the district of of San Pedro D. Lloc, about 30 minutes from the Pacasmayo province and one hour from the department of La Libertad (Trujillo). Here the locals work in commerce, agriculture, livestock and tourism. 

Elia has had a stall in the market of San Pedro D. Lloc for about 20 years. She sells all kinds of vegetables, which allows her to have a daily income, and she has a stable client base. Seeing that her business is growing every day she has had to request Edpyme Alternativa a 2000 soles loan to buy more products (vegetables) in order to continue to meet the needs of her clients. The growing number of clients will allow her to pay back the loan and meet her living expenses. 

She is know for being a hard working woman who has painstakingly moved her business forward in order to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of vegetables.

location.town: San Pedro de Lloc - Pacasmayo - La Libertad

loans.name: Yessika Carolina

texts.es:
La señora Yessika Carolina Q. tiene 26 años de edad, esta casada y tiene dos hijos, su esposo le ayuda economicamente, el trabaja como albañil, viven en el Barrio San Antonio desde hace 10 años.
Yessika se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas, todos los dias se levanta temprano para hacer sus tortillas ya que por las tardes-noches trabaja hasta las 10p.m. en la cafeteria del Hospital de San Lorenzo.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de maiz, leña, cal y agua.
Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en: Yessika Carolina Q., age 26, is married and has two children; her husband is a construction worker. For ten years, they have been living in the neighborhood of San Antonio. Yessika makes her living selling tortillas; every days she wakes up early to prepare tortillas, and in the evenings she works in the cafeteria of the San Lorenzo hospital. Yessika will use the loan to purchase corn, firewood, water, and other ingredients for preparing tortillas. Yessika's dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for preparing tortillas

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis es un hombre soltero de 24 años de edad, vive en casa de unos familiares que cuenta con luz solamente, ubicada en el caserío Simbila a unos 15 minutos del distrito de Catacaos y a 30 minutos del departamento de Piura.  Todas estas zonas se caracterizan porque sus pobladores son agricultores, ganaderos, artesanos y turismo.

José Luis es alfarero(elabora artículos de arcilla como: tinajas, jarras,ollas, etc.) desde hace unos 4 años en su caserío, actividad que le enseño su padre cuando él era muy pequeño, éstos productos son utilizados por las personas que rerlizan o elaboran la chicha de jora, la cual es una bebida típica del norte del Perú,cuenta con clientela fija que le hace pedidos cada cierto tiempo.  Otra actividad que realizaesala comercialización de aves de corral, para seguir obteniendo ganancias para sus gastos diarios.

A creido necesario José Luis pedir un crédito a  Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de materia prima para seguir elaborando sus trabajos de alfarería y atender sus pedidos que están pendientes, para no perder sus clientes que tanto confian en él por lo responsable y cumplido que es.  Gracias a los trabajos que le piden puede seguir saliendo adelante en la vida y  también ayudar a los familiares con los que vive.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is a single 24-year old man who lives with relatives in a home that only has electricity. It is located in the village of Simbila, some 15 minutes from the district of Catacaos and 30 minutes from the department of Piura. All of these areas are known for their population of farmers, ranchers, artisans and for tourism. 

Jose Luis has been a potter in his village for 4 years, a trade that his father taught him when he was very young. He makes articles from clay such as jugs, jars, pots, etc. These products are used by the people that make traditional corn liquor called chicha de jora, which is a typical drink in the north of Peru. He has a set clientele that make orders every so often. He also sells chickens to earn extra money for his daily expenses.

Jose Luis believes it necessary to ask for a loan of 1500 nuevo soles from Edpyme Alternative to buy larger quantities of basic materials to continue making his pottery and to meet his outstanding orders so that he doesn't lose clients that trust him because he is responsible and meets his goals. Thanks to the jobs that they ask of him, he can continue moving forward in life and also help out the relatives with whom he lives.

loans.use: to buy basic materials for making pottery.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
La señora Alejandrina C. tiene 46 años de edad y se dedica a prestar los servicios de moler maiz, tambien por las tardes se dedica a la venta de golosinas y tortillas.
el servicio de moler maiz lo hace muy temprano todos los dias, atiende a los pobladores de esa region, vive con sus 7 hijos, tiene casa propia,  con esfuerzo a sacado adelante a su familia y a arreglado su casa, Alejandrina es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que dia dia se esfuerza para salir adelante.
de las 9:30 a.m. en adelante vende jugos naturales, pastelitos, tacos en la gasolinera que esta cerca de su casa.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para su molino.
Alejandrina desea que sus hijos tengan empleo para que asi colaboren con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is 46 years old and she grinds corn for a living. She grinds corn early every day for the residents of the region. Alejandrina lives with her 7 children in her own house. With much effort, she has advanced her family and finished her house. Alejandrina is a hard-working and responsible woman who day after day, works to get ahead.

From 9:00 am onward she sells natural fruit juices, pastries, and tacos in the gasoline station close to her house. Afternoons, she sells sweets and tortillas.

Alejandrina will use this loan to buy replacement parts for her corn grinding mill.

Alejandrina wants her children to gain employment so they too can contribute to household expenses.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for her corn grinding mill.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 33-year-old married man and the father of one child. He has worked as a barber for fourteen years. He is an expert in his area. Most of his clients are his friends, neighbors, relatives and friends of friends. His reputation in his village increases his number of customers.

Mahmoud has been an Al Majmoua borrower for five cycles, and most of his previous loans were used to improve his business. This time he is requesting the loan in order to buy new tools for his shop and to pay for what's left on a car purchase.

Hopefully Mahmoud is providing his family with a secure and healthy living. He hopes to keep on improving and providing his family with the things they request.

loans.use: to buy new tools for his shop.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 40-year-old married man and the father of three kids. He has worked for twenty-five years as a car mechanic. He was fifteen years old when he first started this kind of business. He mentioned that his childhood wasn't interesting, and he wished he had been able to live it the way he had hoped.

Mohamad is requesting a loan for the fifth time from Al Majmoua, in order to buy car engines necessary for his business at a very good, encouraging price. His previous loans were invested in improving his business, and they had a great effect. Most of his customers are friends, relatives and neighbors, in addition to nearby villagers.

He hopes to keep on improving his business, in order to keep fulfilling his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy car engines necessary for his business.

loans.name: Les Phares De Ouanaminthe 2 & 3 Group

texts.fr:
Amogene est la coordinateur de son groupe Les phares DE OUANAMINTHE.

Amogene habite dans la région de Ouanaminthe d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée.

Amogene a dirigé son commerce de pesos il est aussi un vendeur de Bible pendant les 3 dernières années.

Amogene voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à plus de pesos et de Bible

Des autres membres des phares ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre des produits alimentaires et des produits cosmetiques.

Amogene dit que son défi principal est manque d’acheteurs constants a cause du chômage.

Amogene dit que son rêve est d’agrandir son commerce pour qu’il achète un moto pour le taxi
texts.en:
Amogene is the coordinator for the group "Les Phares de Ouanaminthe" (The Beacons of Ouanaminthe). He lives in the Ouanaminthe region of Haiti where electricity is rare and running water is very limited. He runs a pesos business and for the last three years has also been selling Bibles. He would like to use this loan to invest in more pesos and Bibles.

The other members of "The Beacons" need a loan for businesses such as selling foodstuffs or cosmetics.

Amogene says his chief challenge is the lack of regular customers due to joblessness. His dream is to grow his business so that she can buy a motorcycle to use as a taxi.

loans.use: to invest in pesos for a currency exchange business and in Bibles for resale.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz tiene 52 años, vive al lado de su hija en su casa propia. Hace 10 años se dedica a la crianza de animales, en donde tiene becerros y cerdos que después de varios meses vende su carne al gusto y elección del cliente; logrando así obtener las ganancias que necesita. En esta actividad su  hija la ayuda, mientras pueda encargarse de otra actividad que mantiene, que es la venta de comida, siendo los días de feria cuando más expende estos alimentos. La venta de animales le ha resultado beneficiosa ya que ha aumentado su capital, asimismo con el dinero que tiene puede invertirlo en la siembra de algunas verduras alfalfa y maíz por lo que continuará  en esta actividad,  con la meta firme de tener más capital de trabajo para que le sea más rentable el negocio. Es su crédito número 13 con MFP,  esta muy contenta de ser parte de su banco comunal porque considera a cada integrante como parte importante en su vida. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos.
texts.en:
Luz is 52 years old and lives with her daughter in her own house. For the last 10 years, she has raised livestock. After various months, she sells the meat of the calves and pigs according to customers' orders. In this manner, Luz gains the earnings she needs. Her daughter helps her with the work, while Luz is engaged in her other occupation, which is selling meals.  She sells the most meals on the days of the local fair.

Selling animals has been most profitable and Luz has increased her capital. With the money that she has earned, she has invested in planting crops, alfalfa and corn, and she will continue in this activity, with the firm goal of having more working capital to make her business more profitable.

This is Luz's 13th loan through MFP. She is very content to be part of her communal bank because she considers each member an important part of her life.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in buying pigs.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise and sell.

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en:
Zahra, a 27-year-old married mother of one child, has owned a mobile phones shop since October 2009, a business she decided to start in order to help her husband with their family's income and expenses. Zahra works hard to improve her enterprise, regularly introducing more and different products to her customers. In addition to prepaid mobile numbers, she sells mobile phones and accessories and also perfumes.

Zahra is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua for the first time in order to increase capital for her mobile phone accessories, such as covers, earphones and many other useful accessories. She hopes to expand her business in the future by moving into wholesale trade. As well, she aspires to provide her child with the best childhood and the best education ever.

loans.use: to increase her stock of mobile phone accessories

loans.name: Les Rossignols 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.fr:
A. est la coordinatrice de son groupe Les Rossignols.

A. habite dans la région de Ouanaminthe d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée.

A. a dirigé son commerce de vetements pendant les 3 dernières années.

A. voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à plus de vetements 

Des autres membres des Rossignols ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre des produits alimentaires et du charbon.

A. dit que son défi principal est manque d’acheteurs constants a cause du chômage.

A. dit que son rêve est d’agrandir son commerce pour qu’il achète un moto pour le taxi et aussi un phamacie.
texts.en:
A. is the coordinator of the group “Les Rossignols” (the Nightingales). She lives in the Ouanaminthe region of Haiti, where electricity is scarce and water supplies are very limited. 

A. has been selling clothing for the past 3 years. She plans to use this loan to stock up on clothes. 

Other members of the Rossignols also require financing for such businesses as selling food and coal.

A. believes that her main challenge is the lack of return customers due to unemployment. 

Her ambition is to expand her business so that she may buy a motorcycle taxi and a medicine kit.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of clothing for resale

loans.name: Alma Rosa

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la  señora Alma Rosa le está haciendo falta un cuarto. 
Esta solicitando préstamo para poder comprar el material que es block, varilla, cemento y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de la construcción.
Planea pagar el crédito con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo como vendedora de servicios funerales, ya que su esposo se encargara de los gastos familiares en el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo como chofer de un camión de carga.
Desean que el nuevo hijo que están esperando tenga su propia recamara y espacio en la casa donde el pueda estar sin que lo molestan y donde pueda jugar.
texts.en:
The home of Sra. Alma Rosa is lacking a room. She is requesting a loan to buy materials such as blocks, rods, cement, as well as to pay someone to handle the construction.

Alma plans to repay the loan using the earnings from her job selling funeral services. Her husband will take care of the family expenses with the salary he receives from his job as a truck driver. They are expecting a new baby and would like for their child to have a bedroom and a space to play without bothering anyone.

loans.use: to purchase materials to finish the construction of a bedroom.

loans.name: Roselfina

texts.es: Roselfina tiene 30 años de edad vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Hace 6 años trabaja en las tareas del campo, ella es una emergente agricultora y ganadera pues tiene vacas y cuyes, de las cuales todas las mañanas sin excepción esta al cuidado de ellas, tanto en su alimentación como en el mantenimiento de su granja y limpieza.  Este negocio le es rentable, además al día extrae 10 a 12 litros de leche que los vende.  Paralelamente se dedica también al cuidado de sus tierras de cultivo, en esta ocasión siembra alfalfa, ya que lo utiliza como forraje para sus animales. Es su crédito número 10 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito, podrá adquirir una vaca  de buena raza.
texts.en:
Roselfina is 30 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children. For the past six years, she has worked in the fields. She is an emerging farmer and livestock breeder who raises cows and guinea pigs. Every morning without exception, Roselfina cares for her animals, feeds them, cleans, and maintains her farm. Her business is profitable and she earns extra income selling 10 to 12 liters of milk each day. At the same time she cares for her animals, Roselfina is busy cultivating her farmland. On this occasion, she is growing alfalfa to be used as fodder for her animals.

This is her tenth loan with MFP. Roselfina is very pleased to have financial support. She is grateful to be part of her Communal Bank because all of the members are people she knows who are responsible and supportive. In addition, she would like to thank those responsible for approving her loan request because the funds will be useful in advancing her business. The loan will be used to acquire one cow of good breed.

loans.use: to purchase a cow of good breed.

loans.name: Sulma

texts.es: Sulma tiene 52 años, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 6 años compra animales en un periodo aproximado de 4 meses de nacido para luego engordarlo y al cabo de un tiempo y cuando ya tiene el peso exacto, son vendidos a un mayor precio. Se considera una excelente vendedora, su facilidad de palabra y capacidad de convencer logra que pueda negociar la venta de estos animales. Las ganancias que adquiere le ayudan para el sustento de su familia. En ocasiones sus hijos lo apoyan en este trabajo, cuando tiene tiempo libre. Con el pasar del tiempo, su capital de trabajo ha ido incrementando y eso la mantiene tranquila y satisfecha de realizar un trabajo, que aunque duro debido a las muchas veces que da un cuidado minucioso en la alimentación e higiene de sus animales, es a la vez muy compensado. Desea tener más cantidad de animales para que continúe con esta actividad. Es su crédito número 14 que tiene con MFP, se siente muy contenta de ser parte de su banco comunal además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará un animal más para su establo.
texts.en:
Sulma is 52 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband and five children. For the past six years, she has been buying and raising animals. Within a period of approximately four months, she fattens the animals until they reach an exact weight and then sells them at a higher price. She is considered to be an excellent trader. Her speaking and persuasive abilities have enabled her to negotiate the sale of her animals. The earnings she generates helps her to support her family. Occasionally her children will help her with the work whenever they have free time. Her operating capital has increased over time and has allowed her to perform her work without problems. There have been several instances in which Sulma has found the work difficult because the feeding and health of the animals require meticulous detail, yet there are other times she finds very rewarding. She wants to produce better quality animals in order to continue with her business.

This is her 14th loan with MFP. Sulma is very pleased to be part of her Communal Bank because of all of its members are people she knows. They are responsible and supportive individuals. She is grateful to those responsible for approving her loan request because the funds will be useful in advancing her business. The loan she is reqeusting will be used to buy another animal to add to her stable.

loans.use: to purchase one head of cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase iron in different sizes and oil-based paints.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of recharge cards

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda tiene 40  años de edad, ella es casada.  Vive en casa propia y tiene 04 hijos dependientes, reside en el  Caserío Monte Grande, ubicado a 5 minutos de la ciudad de Mórrope. 

Yolanda se dedica a la venta ambulatoria de  pescado. Ella le compra a un vendedor mayorista y posteriormente lo distribuye en su localidad y en zonas aledañas, cuenta con muchos años de experiencia en este rubro, lo que le ha permitido tener clientela fija.  Además se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio, ella los alimenta de granos y pastos naturales cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta.

Yolanda desea invertir en su negocio de pescado para poder ampliar su zona de distribución y comprar alimento para sus animales, de esta manera ella podrá percibir mayores ingresos económicos , por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 100 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Yolanda es una clienta nueva para Edpyme Alternativa, sin embrago ya ha manejado otros créditos, con un buen historial crediticio, ha demostrado su responsabilidad y puntualidad en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 40 years old, married, and lives in her own home with her four dependent children. They reside in the village of Monte Grande, which is five minutes away from the city of Mórrope.

Yolanda sells fish as a traveling merchant. She buys from a wholesale vendor and distributes her product within her community and in the surrounding areas. Yolanda has many years of experience in this business and has accumulated regular customers. In addition, she raises small animals in a few pens that have been set up near her home. She feeds the animals grains and natural grasses. Once they have developed properly, she offers the animals for sale.

Yolanda wants to invest in her fish business so that she can expand her distribution area, as well as buy feed for her animals, in order to generate more income. For this reason, she is requesting from Edpyme Alternativa a loan in the amount of 1000 PEN in order to accomplish her goal.

Even though Yolanda is a new client of Edpyme Alternativa, she has managed previous loans and has achieved a good credit history. She has demonstrated responsibility and punctuality with her payments.

loans.use: to invest in her fish business and to buy feed for her animals.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela tiene 53 años de edad, ella es viuda con 03 hijos a su cargo.  Vive en casa propia con sus hijos,  dicha casa está ubicada en el caserío Guaraguaos Alto en el distrito de Tambogrande del departamento de Piura.  Graciela vive en la parte rural de este distrito, pero solo cuenta con servicio de luz.

Graciela se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino(ovejas), vacuno(vacas), porcino(chanchos)y a la agricultura, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 10 años.  Cuenta con corrales apropiados y espaciosos.  Los ovinos y porcinos cuando alcanzan tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Las vacas de producen leche la cual vende diariamente. Complementariamente cuenta con  terrenos agrícolas, en el cual cultiva mango.

Graciela esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles, para la compra de alimentos balanceados para sus animales y la implementación un corral para los chanchos.

Graciela, es una clienta nueva para Edpyme Alternativa, sin embrago ya ha manejado distintos créditos, con un buen historial crediticio, ha demostrado su responsabilidad y puntualidad en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Graciela is 53 years old, widowed, and has three dependent children. She and her children live in their own home located in the village of Guaraguaos Alto in the District of Tambogrande, Department of Piura. Graciela lives in the rural section of the district and the only service she receives is electricity.

She earns her living by farming and raising animals such as sheep, cows, and pigs. Graciela has been in this business for 10 years. The animals are kept in their respective pens and have plenty of space. When the sheep and pigs have reached the ideal size and weight, they are sold at the local market. The cows produce milk which she sells on a daily basis. To complement raising animals, Graciela also has farmland on which she grows mangos.

Graciela is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2500 PEN in order to buy balanced feed for her animals and to build a pig pen. Even though Graciela is a new client of Edpyme Alternativa, she has managed different loans in the past. She has a good credit history and has demonstrated that she is responsible and prompt with her payments.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed for her animals and materials to build a pig pen.

loans.name: Juana Lucinda

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Juana, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 14, 12 y 3 años de edad, los mayores  estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.

Ella como buena esposa trata de ayudar con los gastos del hogar, por eso ella realiza los créditos para que su esposo se ayude en su trabajo, el tiene una pequeña embarcación en la cual realiza las faenas de pesca, nos cuenta que el sale a alta mar en las madrugadas y regresa después de dos días, una vez que regresa entregan los productos a los comerciantes que llegan hasta la playa, ya que estos venden en otras ciudades. También algunas veces ellos entregan al menudeo por la zona.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar materiales para la pesca como combustibles, redes, piolas y alimentos para el viaje. Lleva cinco ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado con los créditos.

Su sueño es tener un carro para distribuir sus productos.
texts.en:
The parish of Crucita in Portoviejo Canton is a place known for being sandy. It is here that the members of the Communal Bank “Fe y Esperanza” (Faith and Hope) meet every fifteen days. In addition for being known for its beautiful beaches, Portoviejo is famous for its cuisine and the warmth of its people.

One can find Sra. Juana in this place. She is 32 years old, married, and has three children (ages 14, 12, and 3). Her two older children are in high school. Her husband is a fisherman.

Being a good wife, Juana tries to help with the household expenses. For this reason, she has taken out loans in order to help her husband with his work. He has a small fishing boat that he uses to earn a living. Juana says that her husband leaves for sea at dawn and is gone for two days. When he returns, his products are distributed to merchants who come to the beach and are also sold in other cities. Occasionally she and her husband will deliver his catch to retailers in the area.

This loan will be used to buy materials for her husband’s fishing business such as fuel, nets, lanyards, and food for his trips. Juana has participated in five loan cycles and enjoys the help that the credit has given her.

Her dream is to have a car for distributing their products.

loans.use: to purchase fuel, nets, lanyards, and food for fishing trips.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance of his motorcycle taxi and to pay for repairs to his roof.

loans.name: María Graciela

texts.es:
La Señora María Graciela P. F. vive en la ciudad de Ibarra, tiene 49 años de edad es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos. Graciela tiene un puesto de venta de comida en el mercado de la localidad desde hace 20 años y una de sus hijas le ayuda a trabajar. 
Al principio su local era arrendado y vendía solo desayunos, luego empezó a servir almuerzos y ahora también vende meriendas. Luego de muchos años de trabajo y esfuerzo pudo comprar el local y ahora es de su propiedad, por lo que esta vez solicita un préstamo para invertir en su negocio y con las ganancias poder comprar el local que está junto al suyo para que su hija trabaje en éste. Los planes a futuro de Graciela es terminar de construir su casa y poder brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. María Graciela P. F. lives in the city of Ibarra. She is 49 years old and a single mother with three children. Graciela has a food stand at the local market, where she has worked for 20 years. One of her daughters helps with the business.

At first, she rented her space and only served breakfast. Later she started preparing lunches and now sells afternoon snacks as well. After many years of hard work and effort, she was able to buy her space and now it is her property. Graciela is requesting a loan to invest her business and use her earnings to buy the adjacent space so that her daughter can work there. Her plans for the future are to finish the construction of her house and provide her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in supplies for her food stand.

loans.name: Marilis Maribel

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Marilis, tiene 44 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, dos mayores y dos de 17 y 6  años de edad, los menores son los que aun viven en su casa y estudian en Universidad y escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
 
Ella además de ser una gran ama de casa también se dedica al comercio, tiene una tienda de abarrotes en su casa en la cual vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, además de productos de bazar y materiales para la pesca. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su hija y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando están desocupados, los productos los compra en Portoviejo aunque la mayoría los recibe en su local. Tiene su tienda ya por 10 años  y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos, productos de bazar y de pesca entre otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 7 años y le gusta porque ha hecho más amigas en el grupo.
 
Sus sueños son ampliar su casa y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The parish of Crucita in Portoviejo Canton is a place known for being sandy. It is here that the members of the Communal Bank “Fe y Esperanza” (Faith and Hope) meet every fifteen days. In addition for being known for its beautiful beaches, Portoviejo is famous for its cuisine and the warmth of its people.

One can find Sra. Marilis in this place. She is 44 years old, in a common law marriage, and has four children. Two are adults and the other two are 17 and 6 years of age. The two younger children live at home. One of them studies at the university while the other attends elementary school. Her husband is a fisherman.

In addition to being an excellent homemaker, Marilis has her own business. She manages a grocery store from home where she sells all types of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergents. Marilis also offers products found in a bazaar as well as fishing supplies. She works every day from 6am until 8pm, and sometimes even later. Her daughter and husband help her with the workload whenever they are not busy. Marilis buys her products in Portoviejo and most of them are delivered to her store. Her business has been in operation for 10 years and has done very well.

This loan will be used to restock her store. She will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cured meats, bazaar products, fishing supplies, and other basic necessities. Marilis has been a member of her Communal Bank for seven years and enjoys the friends she has made within the group.

Her dreams include expanding her house and seeing her children become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cured meats, bazaar products, fishing supplies, and other basic necessities.

loans.name: Dios Es Amor Group

texts.es: La Sra. Fanny  es casada, tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar  y tiene 25 años D. edad, actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Dios es Amor” grupo  conformado por 9  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Fanny   trabaja desD. hace  5  años, ella se dedica a la venta D. útiles D. escritorio, papel, lapicero, cuadernos etc. y a su vez venD. artefactos este trabajo surge a raíz D. que ella quería conseguir mejores ingresos para su familia y brindarles una mejor calidad D. vida, es así que trabajo muy duro para obtener lo que hoy en día tiene,nos cuenta que nada fue facil pero  gracias a su esfuerzo  y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, ha construido su casa hasta el segundo piso , hizo su baño, cocina,  . El préstamo que se le otorgo fue para comprar mercadería.  Sabemos que Fanny  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Fanny is married and has 2 school aged children. She is 25 and is a member of the “Dios es Amor” community bank. This group is maD. up of 9 members who work in different business activities. Fanny has worked for 5 years. She sells desk accessories, paper, pencil holders, notebooks, etc. She also sells artefacts. She started doing this work because she wanted more income for her family to offer them a better quality of life. She worked very hard to get what she has today. She tells us that nothing was easy, but thanks to her hard work and dedication she was able to have more income. She has built her house up to the second floor and she maD. a bathroom and kitchen. The loan was given to her to buy merchandise. We know that Fanny will meet her goals with a lot of hard work and dedication and the loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Suipacha Group

texts.es: El Banco D. Emprendimiento SUIPACHA es un banco que ya está en su quinto ciclo y el Banco está conformado por 8 Integrantes 6 Mujeres y 2 Varones y las señoras se dedican al comercio y venta ropas y otros, y la Sra. MERCEDES es la presidenta del Banco y  tiene cuatro hijos 	que se encuentran estudiando, ella se dedica a la venta D. víveres, abarrotes a crédito, compra por cantidad y después entrega a crédito los productos cobrando semanalmente o quincenal  y con el préstamo comprara mercadería por cantidad en abarrotes como fideos, azúcar, arroz, etc. y D. esta manera incrementar su  capital D. trabajo, es un apersona muy trabajadora agradecida por la oportunidad que se le brindo, todas las socias se conocen entre ellas y muchas D. ellas mantienen solas sus hogares y están agradecidas con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: The community bank SUIPACHA is a bank that is already in its fifth cycle. The bank is maD. up of 8 members, 6 women and 2 men. The women are merchants who sell clothes and other things. MERCEDES is the bank president and she has four children who are in school. She sells groceries on credit. She buys wholesale and later sells on credit, collecting weekly or bi-weekly. With the loan, she will buy grocery merchandise wholesale such as pasta, sugar, rice, etc. In this way, she will increase her working capital. She is a hardworking person who is grateful for the opportunity offered her. All of the members know each other and a lot of them are the sole breadwinners in their families. They are grateful to the institution for the support it has offered.

loans.use: to buy grocery merchandise wholesale such as pasta, sugar, rice, etc.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
Guillermo tiene 54 años de edad, el es casado.  Vive con su esposa y sus dos menores hijos en el caserío Senquelito  en el distrito  de Olmos a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Guillermo se dedica a crianza y comercialización de animales menores, especialmente ganado ovino (ovejas) y caprino (cabritos), los cría en sus   corrales situados cerca a su domicilio, el los alimenta con granos y pastos naturales y cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentemente visitan la zona en donde reside.

Guillermo desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos, asi mismo necesita dar mantenimiento a la moto de su propiedad, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Guillermo es un cliente nuevo, del que tenemos referencia de ser un padre bastante entregado a su familia y que siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 54 years old and he is married. He lives with his wife and their two young children in the community of Senquelito in the district of Olmos, at 2 hours from the city of Chiclayo. 

Guillermo raises and sells small farm animals, especially sheep and goats. He raises them in corrals located near his home and he feeds them grains and natural grasses. When they have reached a good level in their development he offers them for sale to the merchants who visit the region where he lives.

Guillermo wants to purchase more livestock and balanced feed to expand his business and to increase his income. He also wants to carry out some maintenance repairs to his motorcycle. In order to reach his objective he has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles. 

Guillermo is a new client and from his references it is known that he is devoted to his family and he is always vigilant over their well-being and development. Those who know him regard him with great esteem and appreciation.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and feed.

loans.name: Yubina Patricia

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Patricia, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 15, 14 y 13 años  de edad, los mismos que estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 4 años, es la presidenta del mismo  y le gusta porque todas sus compañeras son personas muy responsables y ordenadas.

Tiene un mini bazar en su casa en el cual vende una gran variedad de productos, tanto para regalos como para el hogar, además de ropa, zapatos y perfumes. Los fines de semana y feriados instalan un pequeño comedor aprovechando que su casa está frente al mar y como estas playas son muy visitadas en feriados y fines de semana  sus ventas están aseguradas, nos cuenta que el plato preferido por sus clientes son los mariscos en especial el pescado apanado con ensalada y patacones. Lleva 8 años que se dedica a sus negocios.

Este crédito es para comprar arroz,  pescado, platanos verdes, carne y otros ingredientes para preparar los alimentos, así como también ropa que le hace falta en su bazar.
 
Su sueño es agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
In the district of Crucita in the region of Portoviejo we find a place known as Los Arenales. It is where the members of the communal bank named "Faith and Hope" meet every two weeks. It is known for its beautiful beaches, its food, and the welcoming population. 


Here we meet Patricia. She is 34 years old, married, and she has three children from her marriage, aged 15, 14, and 13 years old. They are in school. Her husband is a fisherman. She has been with her communal bank for 4 years and she is the president of the group. She enjoys it because all of her colleagues are very responsible and organized individuals.

She has a small general store from where she sells a wide variety of products, including gifts, items for the home, clothing, shoes, and perfumes. One the weekends and on holidays she sets up a small restaurant, taking advantage of the fact that her house is beside the ocean and since the beaches are very popular on holidays and on weekends, her sales are always guaranteed. She says that her clients' favored menu item is seafood, especially fried fish with a side salad and bananas. She has had her businesses for 8 years.

This loan is to purchase rice, fish, green bananas, meats and other ingredients to prepare foods. She will also purchase articles of clothing that she needs for her store.

Her dream is to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, fish, meats, green bananas, and other ingredients to prepare foods and to purchase articles of clothing.

loans.name: Sheyla Fatima Del Milagro

texts.es:
Fátima  es una madre de familia de 32 años de edad.  Ella vive  en casa de sus padres con su menor hija en el distrito de Ferreñafe a 30 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Fátima cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ella ofrece en venta a sus vecinos diversos útiles de escritorio, así como también el servicio de fotocopiado. El negocio cuenta con más de 3 años de creación y ella actualmente cuenta con una clientela fija y fidelizada. Gracias a esta actividad ella ha podido sacar adelante a su menor hija.

La creciente demanda que la bodega de Fátima ha venido experimentando ha hecho que ella piense en ampliarla adquiriendo más productos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000  nuevos soles.

Fátima es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carácter, las personas que la conocen le tienen mucha estima, cariño y respeto.
texts.en:
Fatima is the mother of a family and she is 32 years old. She lives at home with her parents and her little girl in the district of Ferrenafe, at 30 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Fatima has a grocery store installed in her house. She sells to her neighbors a variety of office supplies and she also provides photocopy services. The business has been in operation for 3 years and she has a stable and loyal clientele. It is thanks to this business that she has been able to provide for her daughter. '

The growing demand experienced by her grocery store has led Fatima to explore some ideas. She is thinking about expanding the business with the acquisition of more products. For this reason she has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles. 

Fatima is a hardworking woman and she has a wonderful personality. Those that know her regard her with great esteem, appreciation, and respect.

loans.use: to purchase office supplies.

loans.name: Jessica Jenny

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Jessica, tiene  30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 11, 8 y de un  año de edad,  los mayores  estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.

Ella se dedica a la cría de chanchos y  aves de corral, tiene una pequeña granja en su casa, nos cuenta que en temporadas compra de cien a doscientos pollos los cuales los cría durante dos a tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya estén listos para la venta, después de este tiempo los pela y los entrega en algunas tiendas de la localidad, también vende por libras o en pie a comerciante que llegan hasta su casa. Los chanchos en cambio los faenan y luego venden la carne por libras,  lleva 5 años dedicada a esta labor.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar la mayor cantidad de pollos, alimentos y medicinas para sus animalitos. Es su cuarto ciclo en el Banco es la tesorera del grupo y está muy contenta porque  le han ayudado mucho.
 
Su sueño es tener una empresa que surta de estos productos a toda la provincia.
texts.en:
In the district of Crucita in the region of Portoviejo we find a place known as Los Arenales. It is where the members of the communal bank named "Faith and Hope" meet every two weeks. It is known for its beautiful beaches, its food, and the welcoming population. 

Here we meet Jessica. She is 30 years old and she is married common-law. She has three children, aged 11, 8, and 1. The older children are in school. Her husband is a fisherman.

She raises pigs and poultry. She has a small farm on her property and she says during certain seasons she purchases from one hundred to two hundred chickens. She raises them during two or three months which is the time needed to for them to be ready for sale. She processes them and sells them to stores in the vicinity. She also sells by taking orders or to merchants who come to her house. The pigs are slaughtered and sold as meat by the pound. She has 5 years in the business.

This new loan will be used to purchase a larger number of poultry, feed, and medicines. This is her fourth loan cycle with the communal bank. She is the treasurer of the group and she is very happy because it has helped her so much. 

Her dream is to have a farm that will supply these products to the entire province.

loans.use: to purchase poultry, feed, and medicines for the livestock.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
La señora Maritza es socia del banco comunal Las Dalilas del Distrito D. Yarinacocha, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 48 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos.
Son 6 años que viene trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica al rubro D. comidas, tiene un local D. recepciones que también alquila para algunas ocasiones, la atención es los fines D. semanas y también lo hacen cuando tiene pedidos.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 3,000.00 compará: 50 metros D. telas para la decoración D. su local, 2 parlantes grandes y 3 juegos D. mesas.
Los préstamos que saca D. Manuela Ramos los invierte íntegramente en su local, porque es el que genera los ingresos.  Su esposo es trabajador independiente, una D. sus hijas es la que le ayuda en su negocio.
texts.en:
Maritza is a member of the communal bank "Las Dalilas" of the district of Yarinacocha, in the department of Ucayali. She is 48 years old, married, and she has 3 children. 

She has been accessing loans for 6 years from Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) and she is in the catering business. She has a party hall that she rents for special occasions. The business operates on the weekends and when orders have been placed.

Her new loan is of S/.3000 nuevos soles to purchase: 50 meters of fabrics to decorate the hall, 2 speakers, and 3 table sets.

The loans that she receives from Manuela Ramos are invested on her business, which is the reason why it generates an income. Her husband is an independent worker. One of her daughters helps her with her business.

loans.use: to purchase speakers and table sets.

loans.name: Alicia Aylid

texts.es:
La señora Alicia es socia del banco comunal Madres Coraje del Distrito Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.
Lleva 2 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de comida (platos a la carta y menú) y lo hace con la ayuda de 2 personas que tiene trabajando para ella.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 soles comprará: 1 juego de ollas, una cocina semi industrial, 2, balones de gas y otros enseres que le hace falta.
El tiempo que viene trabajando en este rubro y la acogida que tiene hace que compre unos enseres más grandes para poder cocinar mas raciones.
Los ingresos que tiene le sirve para poder ayudar a su esposo, quien es mecánico y los trabajos a veces  no son de todos los días.
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the communal bank named "Madres Coraje" of the district of Yarinacocha in the department of Ucayali. She is 27 years old, married, and she has 2 children. 

She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for 2 years. She sells prepared foods (a la carte and from a menu) and she works with 2 employees who help her.

With her new loan of S/.2000 nuevos soles she will purchase: a set of pots, a semi-industrial range, 2 tanks of gas, and other equipment that she needs.

With the time she has been in business and given the demand that she sees, she has decided to purchase larger equipment to allow her to prepare in larger volumes.

The income that she earns is used to help her husband. He is a mechanic and at times he doesn't work daily.

loans.use: to purchase pots and gas tanks.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes forma parte del banco comunal “Aurora Boreal” perteneciente a la ciudad de Viña del Mar. 
Ella se dedica al rubro del comercio, en un bazar que está ubicado en su casa, ahí vende artículos de paquetería, librería, abarrotes y verduras. Se dedica a éste rubro desde hace 4 años.
Su mercadería de abarrotes la compra en supermercados mayoristas y lo que es mercadería de paquetería y librería en la ciudad de Santiago, ya que hay mayor variedad de productos y además los encuentra a bajo costo. 
Con el préstamo comprará mercadería para su bazar y también comprará materiales de construcción para ampliar su negocio y ubicarlo en el ante jardín de su casa, ya que en la actualidad está ocupando espacio de su comedor.
Sus metas son abastecer su negocio de mercadería, ampliar su infraestructura y comprar una conservadora de alimentos (congeladora).
Sus sueños a nivel personal es poder concretar éstos proyectos para tener una mejor situación socio económica y así vivir más tranquila. 
Mercedes vive junto a su hermana, quien le ayuda en el negocio, mientras espera otro trabajo. 
Mercedes está muy agradecida del apoyo y confianza depositado en ella, por parte de Fondo Esperanza, ya que ha sido una gran ayuda para su vida y negocio. Ella asiste a todas las reuniones grupales del banco comunal, las cuales son muy gratas y los demás socios son muy solidarios.
Respecto a las capacitaciones, ha podido integrar estos aprendizajes de ventas a su propio negocio.
Viña del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardín debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. También es considerada la capital turística de Chile.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the communal bank "Aurora Boreal", located in the city of Vina del Mar. She is a merchant who has a general store installed in her house. She sells packaging, school supplies, groceries, and vegetables. She has been in business for 4 years.

Her grocery merchandise is purchased from the wholesale markets and she acquires her packaging and school supplies from the city of Santiago where she finds a variety of products and at lower prices.

With the loan she will purchase more merchandise for her general store and she will also purchase construction materials to expand her business and relocate it to the front yard of her house. It is currently in the dining room area.

Her goal is to supply her store with merchandise, to expand the infrastructure, and to purchase a freezer. 

Her personal dreams are to complete these projects to have a better socio-economic situation and to live a more tranquil life.

Mercedes lives with her sister, who helps her with the business while she finds other work. Mercedes is very thankful for the support and trust that has been imparted upon her by Fondo Esperanza (Kiva Field Partner). It has been a great help for her life and for her business. She attends all of the communal bank meetings. They are very enjoyable and the other members are very supportive.

With respect to the orientation, she has been able to integrate this sales knowledge to her own business.

Vina del Mar is a city and commune located in the central region of Chile. It is known as the City of Gardens for the gardens and patios of the heritage buildings in the city. It is also known as the tourist capital of Chile.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her general store and to purchase construction materials to enlarge the store.

loans.name: Shirley Damaris

texts.es:
La señora Shirley es socia del banco comunal Las Dalilas, del Distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 30 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad.
Lleva también 2 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, en el tiempo que lleva ha podido comprar su refrigeradora para poder vender sus bebidas heladas.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará 5 jabas de gaseosa, 10 cajas de cerveza, 2 cientos de vasos de vidrio, 1 paquete de sorbete, 1 ciento de bolsa de ¼.
Las bebidas las vende en su casa, acondicionó un espacio para poder atender a sus clientes, muchos  de ellos compran y llevan a sus casa.
Con su negocio puede contribuir con algo de dinero para su hogar, su esposo hace lo mismo para poder después ver cuáles son las prioridades de su hogar y poder distribuirlo adecuadamente.
texts.en:
Mrs. Shirley is a member of the communal bank Las Dalilas in the district of Calleria, department of Ucayali.  She is 30 years old, married and has two minor children.

She also has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for two years.  In this time she has bought a refrigerator in order to sell cold beverages.

With the new loan in the amount of 1,200 PEN she will buy jugs of soda, 10 crates of beer, 200 drinking glasses, a package of sorbet and 100 bags.

She sells the drinks from her home where she has adapted a space to be able to attend to customers.   Many of them buy items to take home.  With her business she is able to help with household expenses.  Her husband does the same thing and they decide which household expenses are priority in order to distribute payment correctly.

loans.use: To buy sodas, beer and drinking glasses

loans.name: María Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos de  19, 17, 15, 14 y 5 años  de edad, tres de ellos estudian en colegio, el menor en escuela y el mayor trabaja, todos sus hijos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 años y le gusta porque sus compañeras son muy responsables.

Ella se dedica a la limpieza de pinchaguas (pez pequeño con el que se elabora las sardinas), además de esto junto a su esposo también se dedican a la compra y venta de pescado, el esposo se va en su embarcación mar adentro a sus faenas de pesca y en alguno de los casos hasta donde están los barcos más grande para completar la carga que ellos tienen que entregar. Una vez en tierra firme el se desplaza en un carro fletado a la ciudad de Manta para entregar sus productos  a las grandes empresas que elaboran el atún y las sardinas. Trabajan 22 días  al mes ya que los días restantes está  prohibido pescar.

Este crédito es para  comprar pescado, combustibles y materiales de pesca.
 
Su sueño es tener su propio carro para así no pagar en fletes ya que estos son muy caros.
texts.en:
In the Crucita parish, in Portoviejo Canton, we find a place known as "Los Arenales".  Here the members of the communal bank "Fe y Esperanza" meet every two weeks.  This area is known for its beautiful beaches, gastronomy and warmth of its people.

Here we meet Mrs. Maria, age 33, who is married and has five children, ages 19, 17, 15, 14 and 5.  Four of them are in school, the eldest works and they all live at home.  Her husband is a fisherman.  She has been in the communal bank for five years and enjoys it because her friends there are very responsible.

For a living she cleans "pinchaguas" fish (a small fish used to make sardines).  Also, together with her husband, she buys and sells fish.  Her husband takes his boat out to sea to fish and sometimes supplies fish to larger boats needing to complete their loads.   Once he is back on land he ships his catch to the city of Manta where he sells to the large companies who make tuna and sardines.  They work 22 days a week because the rest of the time fishing is prohibited.

This loan will be used to buy fish, fuel and fishing supplies.

Her dream is to have her own car to avoid paying the high  transport costs.

loans.use: To buy fish, fuel and fishing supplies

loans.name: Dorisa

texts.es:
La Sra. Dorisa, pertenece al Banco Comunal “Las Gaviotas II”, del Distrito de Tarapoto, Provincia de San Martin. Es soltera, tiene 47 años  y es madre de 03 hijos, de los cuales  las 2 mayores son mujeres y ya dependen de sí mismas, solo el menor de 10 años depende de ella y es estudiante del nivel primario. 

Desde muy pequeña tuvo afición por los negocios, es así que por iniciativa propia y junto a su hermana deciden dedicarse a la venta de gallinas desvisceradas, dada la enfermedad de su hermana cambian de actividad por la venta de frutas instalándose en su propia casa,  haciéndose de muy buena clientela por lo que se vieron en la necesidad de incrementar con abarrotes, verduras y otros productos de consumo diario. Al fallecer su hermana ella sola se hizo cargo del negocio.

Con este préstamo de S/. 1700.00 comprará paquetes de fideos, leche en caja y conservas de pescado, aceite  en variedad de marcas, verduras, frutas y artículos de higiene personal para continuar dando una mejor atención a sus clientes. 

Dorisa es mujer luchadora se siente muy animada  a continuar trabajando y esta muy agradecida con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos por ayudar a mujeres como ella a tener oportunidades de desarrollarse en el medio donde se desenvuelven.
texts.en:
Mrs. Dorisa belongs to the communal bank "Las Gaviotas II", in the district of Tarapoto, province of San Martin.  She is 47 years old, single and the mother of three children, two of which are independent.  The youngest one, age 10, is in primary school and is dependent on her.

From a very young age, she was always interested in business, so on her own initiative and together with her sister decided to sell chicken.  When her sister became ill they decided to change their activity and began selling fruit out of their home.  They established a very good customer base and had to increase their stock with groceries, vegetables and other daily consumption products.  When her sister passed away she was left alone with the business.

This loan, in the amount of 1,700 PEN, will be used to buy packages of pasta, cartons of milk, canned fish, several brands of oil, vegetables, fruit and personal hygiene products so she can continue to give her customers the best service possible.

Dorisa is a hard worker who is excited about continuing in her line of work.  She is very grateful to the Manuela Ramos Movement for helping women like herself to have the opportunity to get ahead in their businesses.

loans.use: To buy eggs, oil, detergent, sodas, etc.

loans.name: Bernarda Angelica

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Bernarda, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijas de  13, 11 y 5 años  de edad, las mayores  estudian en colegio y la menor en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
 
Es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana o cada quince de acuerdo a lo que quieran sus clientes. Sus productos los recibe en su casa. Nos cuenta que tiene cinco  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien y que empezó por una amiga que la invito a que  se dedicara a esta actividad.
   
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y bisutería. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por los beneficios que brinda la institución.
 
Su sueño es tener una farmacia.
texts.en:
In the Crucita parish, in Portoviejo Canton, we find a place known as "Los Arenales". Here the members of the communal bank "Fe y Esperanza" meet every two weeks. This area is known for its beautiful beaches, gastronomy and warmth of its people.

Here we meet Mrs. Bernarda, age 32, who is married and has three daughters, ages 13, 11 and 5 who are in school.  Her husband is a fisherman.

She is a homemaker who earns her own income by selling Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and ladies' accessories).  She works three days a week and delivers her orders on a credit basis, collecting payment every one or two weeks, depending on each customer.  She receives her products at home.  She says she has been in business for five years and it has gone well for her.  A friend of hers who does the same thing was the one to get her started.

This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and costomer jewelry.  It is her third loan through the communal bank which she enjoys because of the benefits the institution offers.

Her dream is to have a pharmacy one day.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and costume jewelry

loans.name: Neyda Narcisa

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Neyda, tiene 49 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, tres de ellos ya mayores de edad y el menor de 17  años que estudian en colegio, tres de sus hijos aun viven en su casa. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
 
Ella se dedica a la limpieza de pinchaguas (pez pequeño con el que se elabora las sardinas), pero además en su casa tiene una pequeña granja en la cual cría pollos y gallinas criollas, nos cuenta que en temporadas tiene hasta cien pollos los cuales los cría de dos a tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya están listos para la venta, después los pela y vende por libras a los conocidos que llegan hasta su casa o si no también entrega en tiendas de la localidad. Trabaja todos los días en sus actividades y lo hace con muchas ganas siempre pensando en el bien de su familia.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar la mayor cantidad de pollos, alimentos y medicinas para sus animalitos. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 7 años y le gusta porque con los créditos se ha financiado mucho en momentos difíciles.
 
Su sueño es tener una tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
In the Crucita parish, in Portoviejo Canton, we find a place known as "Los Arenales". Here the members of the communal bank "Fe y Esperanza" meet every two weeks. This area is known for its beautiful beaches, gastronomy and warmth of its people.

Here we meet Mrs. Neyda, age 49, who is in a common-law marriage and has four children.  Three of them are adults and her 17-year-old is in school.  Three of her children still live at home.  Her husband is a fisherman.

For a living she cleans "pinchaguas" fish (a small fish used to make sardines), and also raises chickens and creole hens on her small farm.  Sometimes she has up to 100 chickens that she raises in two or three months' time.  She then sells them by weight to acquaintances who come by or she delivers to stores around town.  She works every day and does it cheerfully because she is always thinking about her family's well-being.

She will use this new loan to buy more chickens, feed and animal medicines.  She has been in the communal bank for seven years and enjoys it because the loans have been very helpful to her in times of need.

Her dream is to open a grocery store.

loans.use: To buy chickens, feed and animal medicines.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro de 43 años es soltero, tiene casa propia con servicios de agua y luz, ubicado en elpueblo joven Jesús Nazareno Cautivo a 10 minutos del distrito de Monsefú y 15 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo.   La cual  se caracteriza por se una zona agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Pedro  desde hace 10 años trabaja como ayudante de construcción, lo contratan  por temporadas y el ingreso que le dan es diario, lo que le permite solventar sus gastos.  Pero ultimamanete como se a incrementado el rubro de construcción, trabajo no le falta y como lo conocen lo recomiendan, lo que le permite mejorar más su calidad de vida.

A solicitado Pedro a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de  500 nuevos soles para comprar herramientas nuevas y reponerlas que están bien deterioradas.  Esto le permitirá realizar mejor su trabajo y con más facilidad, el crédito lo ira pagando  de acuerdo a sus ingresos pero será puntual y responsable.

Pedro es un hombre  muy dedicado a su trabajado, alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir superandose.
texts.en:
Pedro is 43 years old and he is single. He owns his own house and it is installed with running water and with electricity. It is located in the new village of Jesus Nazareno Cautivo, at 10 minutes from the district of Monsefu, and at 15 minutes from the province of Chiclayo. It a region known for its agriculture, farming, and its crafts. 

Pedro has been a construction assistant for the past 10 years. He is a seasonal employee and the income that he earns is given to him daily, which helps him cover his expenses. But lately there has been an increase in construction and there is no want for work and as he is already known he is recommended. This helps him improve the quality of his life.

Pedro requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 500 nuevos soles to purchase new tools and to replace his tools that have worn out. This will help him improve his work and it will help him to complete it with ease. The loan will be paid in accordance with his income but he will be on time and responsible. 

Pedro is a very dedicated to his work. he is happy and he is very eager to keep improving.

loans.use: to purchase new construction tools.

loans.name: Regina Despertina

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como los arenales aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar encontramos a la señora Regina, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 13 y 10  años  de edad los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
 
Ella ayuda a  su esposo con los créditos y en las tareas de limpieza de los peces una vez que desembarcan en las playas de su localidad. Nos cuenta que su esposo sale desde la madrugada para regresar por las tardes, es allí donde nuestra amiga entra en acción y empieza con su labor de limpieza de los peces y luego los venden a los comerciantes que llegan hasta la playa a recoger el pescado para luego llevarlos a las grandes empresas en la ciudad de Manta. Realizan esta actividad cinco días por semana y llevan 12 años dedicados a esta labor.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar materiales para la pesca como combustibles, redes, piolas y alimentos para el viaje. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 2 años, es la secretaria del banco y le gusta porque todo es muy ordenado en su grupo.
 
Su sueño es tener un carro para distribuir sus productos directamente a las empresas
texts.en:
In the district of Crucita in the region of Portoviejo we find a place known as Los Arenales. It is where the members of the communal bank named "Faith and Hope" meet every two weeks. It is known for its beautiful beaches, its food, and the welcoming population. 

Here we meet Regina. She is 30 years old and she is married common-law. She has two children, aged 13 and 10 and they are both in school. Her husband is a fisherman. 

She helps her husband with her loans and by cleaning the fish when they arrive on the beaches of her community. She says that her husband sets out at the break of dawn and he comes back in the afternoon. That is when our friend goes into action and she starts to clean the fish which she later sells to the merchants who come to the beach for the fish. They take the products to the large companies in the city of Manta. They work five days per week and they have been in the business for 12 years.

She will use this loan to purchase fishing materials such as fuel, nets, lanyards, and food for the trips. She has been with her communal bank for 2 years and she is the secretary of the bank. She enjoys it because it is a very organized group. 

Her dream is to have a car to distribute the products directly to the companies.

loans.use: to purchase fuel, nets, lanyards and food for the trip.

loans.name: Johany Jackely

texts.es:
Johany de 23 años de edad, soltera vive con su madre y dos hermanas en edad escolar, lacualcuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en la capilla a 20 minutos del distrito de la Unión y a una hora del departamento de Piura.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.
